confirm_question.description: Are you sure? Must be short when translated

auth_in_progress.description: Message on authorisation page, indicates that twic is getting access_token

auth_already.description: Message indicates that user is already authenticated

auth_failed.message: something is wrong, try again later

add_first_account.description: Message for the first screen when no accounts specified yet

alert_account_add_failed.message: for some reason the extension can't add the account now, try to restart the browser
alert_account_add_failed.description: Error message when extension can't authorize itself with Twitter OAuth

alert_remove_account.message: do you really want to remove $nick$ ?
alert_remove_account.description: Does user really want to remove account?

error_user_not_found.description: Error message on unexistant user profile

title_protected.description: Hint to the protected property user icon

title_attach_link.description: Hint to the current link insert button

title_attach_link_osx.description: Hint to the current link insert button

title_attach_link_disabled.description: Hint to the current link insert disabled button

title_directly.description: Link to the same content on twitter.com hint

title_about.description: Hint to the button to about page

title_button_geo_failed.description: Hint to the geoinfo button if it is failed to get the geolocation info

title_select_or_remove.message: select with left click, remove with right
title_select_or_remove.description: Message helps with selecting or removing accounts

title_select_or_remove_osx.message: select with click, remove with ⌘ + click
title_select_or_remove_osx.description: Message helps with selecting or removing accounts in OS X

title_open_map.description: Hint to the static map link

badge_unread_tweets_count.description: Unread tweets count hint on the badge

about_what.message: Twic is a minimalist Twitter extension that allows you to interact with your Twitter accounts.

about_collaborate.message: feel free to request any feature and discuss something on the $link_start$official site$link_end$

about_translate.message: please help me $translate_link_beg$translate$translate_link_end$ the extension to your language

placeholder_tweet_new.description: Placeholder for the textarea in new tweet element

placeholder_tweet_reply.description: Placeholder for the textarea in reply tweet element

toolbar_accounts.description: Button to return to the accounts page from timeline

toolbar_about.description: Text to the right in the top of about page

options_tweet_show_time_link.message: Make a link to the tweet
